description: Published on Monday, this policy document is the result of careful consideration of the initiatives to be launched around climate, relations with the US and territorial defense.

description: In a speech with a particularly grave tone on Sunday, French President Emmanuel Macron evoked a deteriorating geopolitical context to justify an additional effort to bolster the country's defense spending.

headline: Brazil's far right is divided over Trump's threats
description: The US president's interference in Brazilian affairs, after he announced that he would raise tariffs on Brazilian goods to 50% in protest against the trial of Jair Bolsonaro, has fallen far short of uniting conservatives. Many insist it is necessary 'to set politics aside.'

headline: At Paris' Grand Palais, Denmark and France collaborate through tapestries
description: The New Carlsberg Foundation commissioned four Danish artists to design 16 tapestries that will decorate Koldinghus Castle in Denmark. Crafted by weavers from the French manufactories of Beauvais, Gobelins and Aubusson, these works are currently on display in Paris.

headline: Bastille Day in 1945: Versailles, the city of the Sun King, swept up in republican jubilation
description: '1945, A French Summer' (1/6). On Saturday, July 14, 1945, Versailles was celebrating as it had not done in years. But the carefree spirit of some clashed with the return of deportees and the restrictions still in place.

The dazzling legacy of iconoclastic jewelry designer Attilio Codognato
description: Known for his snake- and skull-shaped jewelry, the iconoclastic designer who died in 2023 also left behind an astonishing collection of works by Andy Warhol, Marcel Duchamp and Maurizio Cattelan, now fiercely protected by his children. His Venetian boutique, once a magnet for global celebrities, remains the only place in the world to find Codognato's singular creations.

headline: AI's turbulent history, from the calculator to ChatGPT
description: Since the 1940s, the meaning of the term 'artificial intelligence' has evolved significantly, as its applications have multiplied and its underlying mechanisms have become more sophisticated. Le Monde takes a look back, decade by decade.

headline: How Trump adapts his tariff threats for economic, diplomatic and ideological ends
description: The American president has threatened the European Union and Mexico with a 30% tariff starting August 1.
